EmailTemplate.subject: Advance Your Business through IT Innovation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
The role of the CIO has evolved dramatically in recent years. How can you keep up in the midst of such change? Check out this blog post <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/blog-modern-cio-patterns/]]> by Eric Wright, Director of Technical Marketing and Technology Evangelist at Turbonomic, to learn more about the current state of IT and the future state modern CIOs are building toward.
Learn More <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/blog-modern-cio-patterns/]]>
In order to keep up with the evolving role of IT, it is crucial that teams embrace automation. Turbonomic can help.
Turbonomic workload automation for hybrid cloud environments delivers enterprise organizations with automation that enables on-premises and public cloud to self-manage in real-time, thereby assuring application performance while lowering cost and maintaining compliance with business policies.Â
Don't take our word for it. Explore Turbonomic for yourself. Download a 30-day free trial of Turbonomic today! <[[https://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4pVAAQ]]>
Best, Andrew
